text: George Pulliam was an American ice hockey defenceman who played for Dartmouth just after World War II. ==Career== Pulliam graduated from Cranston High School. In 1947 he helped Dartmouth capture the Thompson Trophy for the Intercollegiate championship, awarded to the best college team in North America. ==Awards and honors== {| class="wikitable" ! Award ! Year ! |- | AHCA Second Team All-American | 1947–48 | |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:Date of birth unknown Category:American men's ice hockey defensemen Category:Ice hockey people from Rhode Island Category:Dartmouth Big Green men's ice hockey players Category:Sportspeople from Cranston, Rhode Island
title: George Pulliam
